専門家3行コメント.@ja:
新規陽性者数の7日間平均は、十分に下がりきらないまま増加に転じた。
今回の今週先週比が継続すると、2週間後には現在の2倍を超える新規陽性者の発生が予測され、感染の再拡大が危惧される。
専門家3行コメント.@en: The 7-day average of new COVID cases, which has not yet sufficiently declined, has shifted to an increase. It is predicted that if the week-by-week change recorded this time continues on its present course, there will be more than double the current number of new positive cases two weeks from now. As such, there are concerns about a resurgence in cases.

専門家3行コメント.@ja:
入院患者数は3週間連続して増加しており、医療提供体制への影響が危惧される。
重症患者や、中等症以下の患者の中で特に重症化リスクの高い者など、入院治療が必要な患者が入院できる体制を整える必要がある。
専門家3行コメント.@en: The number of hospitalized patients has increased for three weeks straight, and there is concern over the impact this is having on the health care delivery system. There is the need to build up systems so that patients that require hospitalization, such as those with severe symptoms and those with moderate symptoms who are at especially high risk of developing severe symptoms, can be hospitalized.

display.@ja: 感染拡大の兆候がある
display.@en: There are signs that the infection will spread.

display.@ja: 体制強化の準備が必要な状況である
display.@en: The situation necessitates preparations to build up the system.
